## Method and Materials



```{r cars}
# 
setwd("C:\\Users\\shicheng\\Dropbox\\Project\\methylation\\CHOE")
saminfo<-read.table("gdc_manifest.2016-10-17T15-30-06.079111.tsv",head=T)
head(saminfo)
library("stringr")
idv<-unique(as.array(str_extract(saminfo$filename,"TCGA-[0-9|a-z|A-Z]*-[0-9|a-z|A-Z]*-[0-9]*")))
type<-substr(idv,14,15)
table(type)
barplot(table(type))
```
